Package com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load

Class Summary
HBaseLoader Deprecated. replaced by HBaseStorage.
JsonLoader A basic Json Loader.
LzoBaseLoadFunc This class handles LZO-decoding and slicing input LZO files.
LzoBaseRegexLoader Serves as the base class for all regex-based lzo loading functions.
LzoJsonLoader Load the LZO file line by line, decoding each line as JSON and passing the resulting map of values to Pig as a single-element tuple.
LzoProtobufB64LinePigLoader<M extends Message> This is the base class for all base64 encoded, line-oriented protocol buffer based pig loaders.
LzoProtobufBlockPigLoader<M extends Message> Loader for LZO-compressed files written using the ProtobufBlockInputFormat
Initialize with a String argument that represents the full classpath of the protocol buffer class to be loaded.
The no-arg constructor will not work and is only there for internal Pig reasons.
LzoRegexLoader LzoRegexLoader extends LzoBaseRegexLoader, allowing regular expressions to be passed by argument through pig latin via a line like: A = LOAD 'test.txt' USING com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.storage.LzoRegexLoader('(\\d+)::(\\w+)\|\|(\\w+)'); which would parse lines like 1::one||i 2::two||ii 3::three--iii into arrays like {1, "one", "i"}, {2, "two", "ii"}, {3, "three", "iii"}
LzoTextLoader Load the LZO file line by line, passing each line as a single-field Tuple to Pig.
LzoThriftB64LinePigLoader<M extends TBase<?,?>>  
LzoThriftBlockPigLoader<M extends TBase<?,?>>  
LzoTokenizedLoader Same as LzoPigStorage.
LzoW3CLogLoader Load w3c log LZO file line by line, passing each line as a single-field Tuple to Pig.
 

Enum Summary
JsonLoader.JsonLoaderCounters  
LzoBaseRegexLoader.LzoBaseRegexLoaderCounters  
LzoJsonLoader.LzoJsonLoaderCounters  
LzoW3CLogLoader.LzoW3CLogLoaderCounters
